statements: DELETE FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND prescription_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND is_adherent = FALSE;
DELETE FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Paracetamol' AND (dosage = '500mg' OR dosage = '750mg');
DELETE FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50 AND frequency = 'daily';
DELETE FROM medication_adherence WHERE adherence_date < '2022-01-01' AND taken = false;
DELETE FROM prescriptions p USING medication_adherence ma WHERE p.prescription_id = ma.prescription_id AND p.medication_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM prescription WHERE patient_id = 100 AND doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM doctor WHERE hospital_name = 'General Hospital';
DELETE FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_id IN (SELECT prescription_id FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female');
DELETE FROM medication_records WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND address = '123 Street');
